meanings.definition: People who live together in the same household.
meanings.sent1: My coresidents and I share a kitchen in our apartment.
meanings.sent2: The coresidents of the house had a meeting to discuss chores.
meanings.sent3: The coresidents threw a surprise party for their roommate.
meanings.sent4: In our cozy home, we are like a family of coresidents.
meanings.sent5: The coresidents always help each other out in times of need.

meanings.definition: The act of living together in the same household.
meanings.sent1: Cohabitation among coresidents can lead to strong bonds.
meanings.sent2: The coresidents' agreement on house rules made living together easier.
meanings.sent3: The coresidents celebrated their one-year anniversary of living together.
meanings.sent4: Living as coresidents requires mutual respect and understanding.
meanings.sent5: The coresidents' daily interactions create a sense of community.
